ability.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the state of being able to do something
ability.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The health center serves all patients, regardless of their ability to pay.
ability.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone’s level of skill at doing something
ability.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The test measures your mathematical ability.
There are musicians of all abilities.
He showed his abilities as a leader.
